title: Bug Splat
body: I just updated my graphics cards and my entire computer yesterday. Tried to play league today got bug splat error. My team had to do a remake cause I couldn't connect. Restarted my client 3 times. Even restarted my computer still to no avail. Any ideas?

replies.body: K so in order of that checklist. I meet the system requirements, I have all the latest drivers and the latest version of direct x which is 12, I have windows 10, I have .net framework 3.5 and 4, I've run the repair even completely uninstalled and then reinstalled, ran a clean start up on my comp, reset my graphics card to factory default, & I can't get in game to mess with the game settings.

So I went threw the checklist I even backed up my drivers to the previous driver and still nothing. hoping this patc will somehow fix whatever is causing the error but my hopes aren't high. Any suggestions?
Still getting bugsplat errors just trying to test in custom games to see if its fixed

Perhaps the new drivers are causing the problem. I recommend [rolling back the driver](http://www.nvidia.com/object/driver_rollback.html) to see if it resolves the issue. If you still see issues afterwards, we've consolidated a list of fixes for bugsplats that can be found [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if you continue to have problems.
I am getting the same, been trying to play for 2 days now.
